Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.scene

Class LobbyPhaseSceneBuilder

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.scene.LobbyPhaseSceneBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
SceneBuilder
public class LobbyPhaseSceneBuilder extends Object implements SceneBuilder
A SceneBuilder that constructs the lobby phase scene

  • Constructor Details

    • LobbyPhaseSceneBuilder

      public LobbyPhaseSceneBuilder(javafx.beans.property.ListProperty<String> playerList, javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyBooleanProperty hasPendingMessages, javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyBooleanProperty rejoining, Runnable onLeave, Runnable afterEndGame)
      Creates a new instance using the specified callback and property
      Parameters:
      playerList - a javafx.beans.property.ListProperty<String> representing the player list
      hasPendingMessages - a binding indicating whether the server has any pending messages
      rejoining - a boolean property indicating whether this lobby is waiting for other players to join it
      onLeave - the callback for when the leave button is clicked
      afterEndGame - the callback ran after the "to main menu" has been pressed on the end game dialog
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null
